title: Descriptive Title of the Challenge
description: Detailed description of the challenge, including background, significance, and objectives.
domain: Scientific or Engineering Domain (e.g., Physics, Biotechnology, Environmental Science)
subdomain: More specific area within the domain (e.g., Quantum Computing, Genetic Engineering)

goals.goal_description: Description of the specific goal related to the challenge

metrics.metric_description: Description of the metric to measure progress
metrics.unit: Unit of measurement (e.g., percentage, count, binary)
metrics.target_value: Desired target value of the metric

stakeholders.name: Name of the stakeholder
stakeholders.type: Type of stakeholder (e.g., Government, Academic, Industry, Non-profit)
stakeholders.role: Role of the stakeholder in addressing the challenge

funding.source: Source of the funding (e.g., NSF, EU Horizon 2020)
funding.allocated_to: Specific goals or tasks funded by this source

milestones.status: Status of the milestone (e.g., Planned, In Progress, Completed)

challenges_and_risks.risk_description: Description of the risk or challenge

related_projects.title: Title of the related project
related_projects.description: Brief description of the related project
related_projects.link: URL or reference to the related project

publications_and_resources.title: Title of the publication or resource
publications_and_resources.link: URL or reference to the publication

collaborations.outcomes: Expected or achieved outcomes from the collaboration
